replies.body:
Hey,
I was just wondering are the skins that are part of the Snowdown Bundles, are they also sold separately, like Snow Bunny Nidalee, Winter Wonder Orianna or Silent Night Sona and etc... Last year you were able to buy them each separatly, is going to be the same this year?
Yep, the Legacy skins will be sold individually as well as in bundles.
Great, thanks for replying.
do you still get a free mystery skin if a legendary skin is gifted to you??
What happens if I gift someone a legendary skin? Will I get the mystery skin, will they get the mystery skin, or will no one get the mystery skin?
40 degrees Celsius here and we are doing snowdown?
Australia here... Christmas in Summer is the way we do it.
can skins from your personal snowdown shop be gifted?
Riot, what would happen if I bought a legendary skin on sale? Would i still get a free mystery skin even though it's not worth 1820 RP?
All Legendary skins count!
Why wouldn't both icons be purchasable with IP? Why just 1?
Hold on, do 1350 skins count as legendary skins? Or is it just 1820 and above?

There are SOME skins that are not 1820 that are considered legendary. You can go into the league client's store and sort the skins available in there to only Legendary. These are the skins they are talking about.

Why is Snowday Bard not legacy,
1) Its a snowdown skin?
2) its like a really cool snowdown skin
3) its Bard
Make it a legacy skin!!! U shouldnt be able to buy a christmas skin mid june!!!
So the legendary snowball only starts on December 23rd? And if I get a legendary skin now, nothing more will happen?
yes nothing will happen until December 23rd
why poro king not out yet??????????????????
Hey in regards the personalised snowdown shop, what happens if you own all champions, does it just offer you the skin at discounts or is it only for bundles including champs not owned?
I really dig the Poro King game mode keeps howling abyss more interesting. Shame they wont keep it in as a permanent mode... Just like URF mode... What a joke.
but then noone will play any other gamemode if urf is permanent
Very unlikely,  casual players deserve to have URF mode as a permanent choice.
will i be able to buy winter wonder lulu or orianna by it self ? and how much rp will it cost ? {{champion:117}} {{champion:61}}

Thank YOU so much for giving us oldies something to do with all this stockpile of IP.
<3 <3 <3 <3 <3
{{champion:266}} {{item:3041}}
Quick question, do you get the mystery skin after you purchase the legendary skin, or is it after the 8th?
What if, by the odd chance, an ultimate skin is gifted or bought? Will that snowball into a free mystery gift?
Does legendary snowball still apply if you're giving a legendary tier skin  to a friend?

Would the legendary skin snowball work for ultimate skins? 
Because I've wanted to get DJ Sona and at first thought this would be the time and I'd get another skin with it. 
But I remembered it was an ultimate and not legendary, so.. what's the go?
So it's happened. It's finally happened. Riot is making League of Legends into Club Penguin. {{champion:32}} {{champion:32}} {{champion:32}}

will the skins in bundles be sold for half price by it self??
I WANT SLAY BELLE KAT{{champion:55}} {{champion:55}}{{champion:55}}{{champion:55}}{{champion:55}}{{champion:55}}{{champion:55}}{{champion:55}}{{champion:55}}{{champion:55}}{{champion:55}}{{champion:55}}{{champion:55}}{{champion:55}}

oceanic is steaming hot this time of year there could be a variation a challenge for riot to make a hot theme for oceanic server beach theme or maybe a Hades variation or something different other then snow, all that reminds us of is how friggin hot it is and how nice it would be to even see snow! and feel that coldness haha just an idea. {{champion:63}} {{champion:10}} {{champion:63}}

Excuse me @riot. the caution snowstorm skin sales there is workshop shaco on sale. but here there is a bundle for nutcrako. is it possiable to buy nutcrako without the bundle? if so why isnt it mentioned in the cation snowstorm sales? plz get back to me i want to buy these
You can get the Legacy skins individually as well as in bundles.
how come I cant make another account right now? fix it rito!!!!
Gunter ...... is that you????
So is your snow down shop using Ip for the champions or Rp?
RP
i just buy some RP but i cant see any extra RP?
Have a look at the RP store. If the $100 choice comes with 13,800 RP, then that's the bonus RP included already from what I remember. I don't know how much the other prices are.
Riot, how much would the bundles be if you own the champions already? How much do you minus off the above prices? Thanks
why no project poro ward
